column1: #Text=How do you know Canada will not end up fractured just like Belgium?
#Text=We already have many factions in Canada just like Belgium which will only get more pronounced with a proportional system.
#Text=English/French, Western Canada/Central Canada, Atlantic Canada, urban/rural, anti-gun/pro-gun, et.c, etc.
#Text=Are you ready to roll the dice with Canada's future?
#Text=Rather say, I won't gamble on something this important.
